document_data.name: Sorntalar's Rest
document_data.mainbody: '''Sorntalar's Rest''' was the an inn located in the [[Amn]]ian city of [[Crimmor]].{{Cite dragon/334/Crimmor: City of Caravans|26-29}} It was famous for offering a quiet place for guests desiring to rest up.{{Cite dragon/334/Crimmor: City of Caravans|26-29}}
document_data.Location: The inn was located in the [[Crimmor/Wheel Ward|Wheel Ward]], near the western city walls.

Interior.Atmosphere: Tapestries were hung from the thick walls, and halls were carpeted in order to dampen excessive noise,{{Cite dragon/334/Crimmor: City of Caravans|23}} The owner attached a great importance to the quietness of her establishment, going so far as to ask noisy guests to leave.
